post.body: I will try if its possible to tear her off of @brianmerwin .. or vice versa.. lol
no its mostly for my non photog friends who's avatars are kinda.... "Meh" (in merwinspeak) and brian looks fabulous sans stalkers.
tee hee :)
yep, you are nakked.. I can see.. shouldn't stand so close to the window... :)
oh girl get in there asap... get well soon!!
you must not read @kuteykat 's tweets to me very often...
what am I? A clown? Get back to work!
I am in bed... Sleeping :)
its not the middle yet.. and you don't have to listen to xmas music anytime soon either... LOL
i'll put them in, and then kick your ass all over the net little girl.. mwuhahahahha!
not yet... you need your ass handed to you or something?
a ling! ;}
dunno, but good thing I could do it the other night.... I posted my mobile number on accident... LOL
@susanmercedes at least your accidental dm's weren't as dramatic as mine!! my phone sure has been quiet.. LOL
no such thing..
I noticed..
whatever happened to Jamaica?
the more the marrier! 6-12 I will be there.
as long as they are female I think I could handle it :)
still thinking of skipping over to Vegas? LOL
keep dreaming batty!
I think there only like.. a few phones that do the barcode scanning. and its only reg not the matrix kind in japan.
how dare you curse the beer! You have no one to blame but yourself.. See what you get for cheating on wine..
do you mean doing 6 guys?
Hmmm.. Playboy Bunny DJ, Miss Pussykatt and @colorsplashes .. I know we chose correctly. I think we are going to get burgers too!
anytime we can go for curry anytime its pretty awesome! yea I am sad you can't come tonight.
curry is right now... hook up with brian about tonight, he hasn't answered me today yet. Lets do dindin!! kazoo somewhere!
first time here!! its awesome! the concert was great!! you have to come next time!!!
it won't be breakfast.. It will be lunch. I am never awake early enough for breakfast.
you r crazy! its curry tiime in 1 hour.
;p the only thing sweet I want is some frackin' mt.dew!
I am thinking its curry time. Got hours? Cheap place.
thanks to you for the follow as well sir.. You have some nice on Flickr as well ;)
its still early.. maybe later.
nahhhh maybe tomorrow or something
"the boots with the fur".. "everyone is looking at her".. "she hit the flooo".. "next thing you know"..
http://twitpic.com/uak9 - get the lemon loaf... but don't let the guy order it :)
oh don't worry its already been brought-it! your are going down all the way to china town!! to buy me some pho noodles!
oh we are gonna scrap!! I don't think Vegas is big enough for that!!
you passed the test, you said nothing of snow.... but you use 'hate' ;)
you do realize we are going to be in the same vicinity in a matter of day ;p
np girly :) will do!
I am just surprised it is not running around the house!
now you are just torturing me!!!!!!
I thought you took a nap?
you are the first person to steal my heart this year, singing Christina Aguilera! Como un genio liberado hare tus suenos realidad
I don't know why you're not there, I give you my love ,but you don't care!
all showered, time to head out to GR for swing, most likely churchills/moxie.. and who knows..
